articles.description: Manchester United agree a deal worth £73.7m (85m euros) with Red Bull Leipzig to sign Benjamin Sesko.
articles.title: Benjamin Sesko: Manchester United agree deal to sign Red Bull Leipzig forward

articles.description: Former Manchester United midfielder Scott McTominay is among the 30-name shortlist for the 2025 Ballon d'Or award.
articles.title: Ballon d'Or 2025: Scott Mctominay nominated after Napoli title victory

articles.description: As usual, Glenn McGrath predicts Australia will win the 2025-26 Ashes 5-0 - but says Joe Root and Harry Brook are the England players the hosts will fear most.
articles.title: Ashes 2025-26: Glenn McGrath predicts 5-0 win for Australia

articles.description: Ghana midfielder Thomas Partey joins Spanish side Villarreal following his release by Arsenal.
articles.title: Thomas Partey: Former Arsenal midfielder joins Villarreal

articles.title: The Hundred 2025 LIVE: Northern Superchargers vs Welsh Fire - cricket score, radio & updates

articles.description: Five of England's Euro 2025-winning squad are nominated for the Women's Ballon d'Or, with boss Sarina Wiegman among the coaching nominees.
articles.title: Women's Ballon d'Or: Five of England's Euro 2025-winning team nominated

articles.description: Jonathan Edwards' triple jump world record has been standing for 30 years - why hasn't it been broken?
articles.title: Jonathan Edwards' 30-year-old triple jump world record 'not a good sign for athletics'

articles.description: Saudi Pro League side Al-Hilal reach an agreement to sign Liverpool and Uruguay striker Darwin Nunez for 53m euros (£46.3m).
articles.title: Darwin Nunez: Al-Hilal reach agreement to sign Liverpool striker for £46.3m

articles.description: Barcelona strip keeper Marc-Andre ter Stegen of the club captaincy following disciplinary proceedings against the Germany international.
articles.title: Barcelona strip goalkeeper Marc-Andre ter Stegen of captaincy

articles.description: Teenager Victoria Mboko continues her fairytale run at the Canadian Open by booking a final date with Naomi Osaka.
articles.title: Victoria Mboko: Teenager to face Naomi Osaka in Canadian Open final after stunning comeback
